==Story==
{{VO/Story
|character           = Yoimiya
|language            = ja
|name                = 宵宮

|vo_01_01_title      = 初めまして…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 「長野原」へよう来てくれたな！うちは宵宮、何でも言うてや～！<br />うん？串カツの盛り合わせと玉子焼き…って、ちゃうちゃう、うちは飲食店ちゃうでぇ、花火屋やからな！そや、キラキラーっとした、パッと咲く花火のことや！
|vo_01_01_rm         = "Naganohara" he you kitekureta na! Uchi wa Yoimiya, nandemo yuute ya~!<br />Un? Kushikatsu no moriawase to tamagoyaki... tte, chau chau, uchi wa inshokuten chau dee, hanabi-ya yakara na! Soya, kirakiraa tto shita, pa tto saku hanabi no koto ya!
|vo_01_01_tl         = Welcome to "Naganohara"! I'm Yoimiya, let me know what you want!<br />Hmm? Assorted Kushikatsu and Egg Roll... no, no, we're not a restaurant, we're a fireworks shop! See, sparkling, blooming fireworks like this!

|vo_02_01_title      = 世間話・花火
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Fireworks
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Fireworks.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = 花火はパッと消えてまうけど、友情は一生もんや。
|vo_02_01_rm         = Hanabi wa pa' to kietemau kedo, yuujou wa isshou mon ya.
|vo_02_01_tl         = Fireworks fade in an instant, but friendship lasts for life.

|vo_02_02_title      = 世間話・暇つぶし
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Telling Stories
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Telling Stories.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = 暇やったら、何か話したるで！
|vo_02_02_rm         = Hima yattara, nanika hanashitaru de!
|vo_02_02_tl         = If you're free, let me tell you about something!

|vo_02_03_title      = 世間話・金魚
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Goldfish
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Goldfish.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = 金魚飼ったことある？大人しゅうて、めっちゃ可愛ええんや。
|vo_02_03_rm         = Kingyo katta koto aru? Otonashuute, meccha kawaee n'ya.
|vo_02_03_tl         = Have you ever kept goldfish as pets? They're quiet, and very cute.

|vo_03_01_title      = 雨の日…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = ひぃ～、花火が濡れてまう！どっかに隠れな！うぅ、間に合わへん！
|vo_03_01_rm         = Hii~, hanabi ga nuretemau! Dokka ni kakurena! Uu, ma ni awahen!
|vo_03_01_tl         = Eek, the fireworks will get wet! Let's hide somewhere! Oh, we're not going to make it!

|vo_03_02_title      = 雪の日…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When It Snows
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = ははっ、雪球をギュッと、ほれ&mdash;&mdash;
|vo_03_02_rm         = Haha', yukidama wo gyutto, hore{{lmdash}}
|vo_03_02_tl         = Haha, roll up a snowball, and hey&mdash;

|vo_03_03_title      = 晴れの日…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When the Sun Is Out
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Sun Is Out.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 全身ポカポカで気持ちええわぁ～、浮いとるみたい。
|vo_03_03_rm         = Zenshin pokapoka de kimochi ee waa~, uitoru mitai.
|vo_03_03_tl         = It feels nice and warm all over~ almost like I'm floating.

|vo_03_04_title      = 暴風の日…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When the Wind Is Blowing
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Wind Is Blowing.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = すっごい風やなぁ&mdash;&mdash;声が押し戻されそうや&mdash;&mdash;！
|vo_03_04_rm         = Suggoi kaze ya naa{{lmdash}} Koe ga oshimodosaresou ya{{lmdash}}!
|vo_03_04_tl         = The wind is so strong &mdash; My voice is getting pushed back at me&mdash;!

|vo_04_01_title      = おはよう…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = すぅ…はぁ&mdash;&mdash;おはようさん、朝の空気は清々しくて気持ちええなぁ、深呼吸して頭もすっきりや。
|vo_04_01_rm         = Suu... haa{{lmdash}} Ohayousan, asa no kuuki wa sugasugashikute kimochi ee naa, shinkokyuu shite atama mo sukkiri ya.
|vo_04_01_tl         = *deep breath* Good morning! The morning air is crisp and feels great; if you take a deep breath, your mind will feel refreshed.

|vo_04_02_title      = こんにちは…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = お昼の時間やな。ええっ…今日の卵、黄身が二つやん。えへへ～、今日のうちツイてるんやない？
|vo_04_02_rm         = Ohiru no jikan ya na. Ee'... Kyou no tamago, kimi ga futatsu yan. Ehehe~, kyou no uchi tsuiteru n'ya nai?
|vo_04_02_tl         = It's time for lunch. Eh... Today's egg has a double yolk. Ehehe, I'm lucky today, aren't I?

|vo_04_03_title      = こんばんは…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = やっと花火を見るのにちょうどええ時間になったな。空でも地上でも綺麗に咲かしたるで…ははっ、冗談や！安全にはちゃーんと気ぃつけるさかい。
|vo_04_03_rm         = Yatto hanabi wo miru no ni choudo ee jikan ni natta na. Sora demo chijou demo kirei ni sakashitaru de... Haha', joudan ya! Anzen ni wa chaanto kiitsukeru sakai.
|vo_04_03_tl         = It's finally a good time to see the fireworks. I can make them bloom beautifully in the sky or on the ground... Haha, just kidding! I'll make sure I pay attention to safety.

|vo_04_04_title      = おやすみ…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = そもさん&mdash;&mdash;！花火を見終わった後、その一日の最後には何が待っとる？ふふん、正解は&mdash;&mdash;夢の中でも花火が見れる、でした～！ほな、さいなら！
|vo_04_04_rm         = Somosan{{lmdash}}! Hanabi wo miowatta ato, sono ichinichi no saigo ni wa nani ga mattoru? Fufun, seikai wa{{lmdash}} yume no naka demo hanabi ga mireru, deshita~! Hona, sainara!
|vo_04_04_tl         = Here's a question! What awaits you at the end of a day of watching fireworks? Hehe, the answer is... watching fireworks in your dreams, too! Well then, bye-bye!

|vo_05_01_title      = 宵宮自身について・家族
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}: Family Matters
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Family Matters.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = うちの父ちゃんは耳が遠くてな、昔から何を言うても笑うてばっかやった。だから、小っちゃい頃は自分の言うとることがどれも面白いんやろなと思っとった、ずーっと一人で喋り続けとったわ…実際は、よう聞こえへんから誤魔化すように笑うとっただけやのに…せやけど、父ちゃんが笑うてくれるなら、うち、これからも喋り続けるで。
|vo_05_01_rm         = Uchi no touchan wa mimi ga tookute na, mukashi kara nani wo yuute mo waroute bakka yatta. Da kara, chicchai koro wa jibun no iutoru koto ga dore mo omoshiroi n'yaro na to omottotta, zuutto hitori de shaberi tsudzuketotta wa... Jissai wa, you kikoehen kara gomakasu you ni waroutotta dake ya no ni... Seyakedo, touchan ga waroute kureru nara, uchi, kore kara mo shaberitsudzukeru de.
|vo_05_01_tl         = My father has poor hearing, and for ages, he'd always smile no matter what I said to him. So when I was young, I figured that everything I said was interesting, and I kept talking on and on by myself... In reality, he was only smiling to throw me off because he couldn't hear clearly... but as long as he smiles for me, I'll keep talking to him.

|vo_05_02_title      = 宵宮自身について・言葉
|vo_05_02_subtitle   = About {character}: Talking
|vo_05_02_friendship = 4
|vo_05_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Talking.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx         = 「口は災いの元」ゆうけど、心配あらへん。言葉に込もった気持ちは嘘をつかへんもん。間違ったことを言うて誤解されても、それを説明すればええんや。なんも言わんかったら、相手も理解のしようがあらへん。やないと、心も離れてまう。
|vo_05_02_rm         = "Kuchi wa wazawai no moto" yuu kedo, shinpai arahen. Kotoba ni komotta kimochi wa uso wo tsukahen mon. Machigatta koto wo yuute gokai sarete mo, sore wo setsumei sureba ee n'ya. Nan mo iwankattara, aite mo rikai no shiyou ga arahen. Ya nai to, kokoro mo hanaretemau.
|vo_05_02_tl         = They say "words can lead to disaster," but I'm not worried about that. The emotions contained within words don't lie. Even if you say something wrong and are misunderstood, it'll be fine if you explain yourself. If you don't say anything at all, others have no way to understand you. Without that, your hearts will drift apart.

|vo_06_01_title      = いんじゃんについて…
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Rock, Paper, Scissors
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Rock, Paper, Scissors.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = いんじゃんほい！あいこでしょ！わーい、うちの勝ちや！やったぁ！…うん？後出しなんてしてへんよ、してへんてば。
|vo_06_01_rm         = In-jan-hoi! Ai-kode-sho! Waai, uchi no kachi ya! Yattaa! ...Un? Atodashi nante shitehen yo, shitehen teba.
|vo_06_01_tl         = Rock, paper, scissors! Rock, paper, scissors!<ref group="TN •">In this line, Yoimiya calls out two rounds of rock-paper-scissors. Her chant for the first round ({{ja|いんじゃんほい|in-jan-hoi}}) is particular to the Kansai dialect, and {{ja|あいこでしょ|aiko desho||seems like a draw}} is the usual chant for a round right after a draw.</ref> Yay, I won! Hooray! ...Hmm? I didn't wait to see your move, I really didn't.

|vo_06_02_title      = 一緒にいることについて…
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Companionship
|vo_06_02_friendship    = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Companionship.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 自分一人で何かするよりも…誰かと一緒に何かやる方がええ。例えばあんたと一緒なら、風景を見ても、缶蹴りをしても、めっちゃ楽しい。きっと、あんたと話すのが飽きひんからやろな。
|vo_06_02_rm         = Jibun hitori de nanika suru yori mo... dare ka to issho ni nanika yaru hou ga ee. Tatoeba anta to issho nara, fuukei wo mite mo, kankeri wo shite mo, meccha tanoshii. Kitto, anta to hanasu no ga akihin kara yaro na.
|vo_06_02_tl         = Rather than doing things by myself... I prefer doing things with others. For example, if I'm with you, whether we're admiring the scenery or playing kick the can, it'll be super fun. After all, I never get tired of talking to you.

|vo_07_01_title      = 「神の目」について…
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_friendship    = 4
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 内緒なんやけど、実はなぁ、初めて「神の目」をもろた時、火打ち石やと思うて使っとったんや。花火に火付けたり、お湯を沸かしたりしとった。それから納屋に置きっぱなしにしとったんやけど、それを父ちゃんが見つけてな、えらいもんやから大事にしい言われた。はは、神様が回収せえへんかったのが不思議や。
|vo_07_01_rm         = Naisho nan ya kedo, jitsu wa naa, hajimete "Kami no Me" wo morota toki, hiuchi-ishi ya to omoute tsukattotta n'ya. Hanabi ni hitsuketari, oyu wo wakashitari shitotta. Sore kara naiya ni okippa ni shitotta n'ya kedo, sore wo touchan ga mitsukete na, erai mon yakara daiji ni shii iwareta. Haha, kami-sama ga kaishuu seehenkatta no ga fushigi ya.
|vo_07_01_tl         = This is a secret, but actually, when I first got my Vision, I thought it was a flint and used it as one. I lit fireworks with it, and boiled water with it. Then I left it abandoned in a storehouse, but my father found it, and he told me it was something very important that I should keep safe. Haha, it's a wonder our god didn't take it back from me.

|vo_07_02_title      = シェアしたいこと・海灯祭
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share: Lantern Rite
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share - Lantern Rite.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 知っとる？璃月の海灯祭で打ち上がる花火はな、大体がうちで作ったもんなんや。注文通り作った後、北斗の姉ちゃんが船で届けとる。今は鎖国で輸出も制限されとるけど…祭りに花火があらへんのはあかんやろ。
|vo_07_02_rm         = Shittoru? Riiyue no Kaitou-sai de uchiagaru hanabi wa na, daitai ga uchi de tsukutta mon nan ya. Chuumon-doori tsukutta ato, Hokuto no nee-chan ga fune de todoketoru. Ima wa sakoku de yushutsu mo seigen saretoru kedo... Matsuri ni hanabi ga arahen no wa akan yaro.
|vo_07_02_tl         = Did you know? We produce most of the fireworks that are set off in Liyue's Lantern Rite. After we make them to order, Big Sis Beidou delivers them on her ship. Now, under the Sakoku Decree, exports are restricted, but... A festival without fireworks is no good, isn't it?

|vo_07_03_title      = シェアしたいこと・物語
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Something to Share: Cycles
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share - Cycles.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = 「花火はな、空に花を咲かせ光を散らしたあと、雨や雪になって大地に帰るんや。そうやって土を潤し、人を育み、もういっぺん綺麗な花を空に咲かすんや。」父ちゃんは、よう物語を聞かせてくれるんやけど、今のがいっちゃんのお気に入りや！
|vo_07_03_rm         = "Hanabi wa na, sora ni hana wo sakase hikari wo chirashita ato, ame ya yuki ni natte daichi ni kaeru n'ya. Sou yatte tsuchi wo uruoshi, hito wo hagukumi, mou ippen kirei na hana wo sora ni sakasu n'ya." Tou-chan wa, you monogatari wo kikasete kureru n'ya kedo, ima no ga icchan no o-ki ni iri ya!
|vo_07_03_tl         = "After the fireworks make flowers bloom and light scatter across the sky, they become rain and snow and return to the earth. That way they nourish the land and nurture humanity, and once more make beautiful flowers bloom in the sky." My father told me lots of stories, but this one is my favorite!

|vo_07_04_title      = シェアしたいこと・木漏れ日
|vo_07_04_subtitle   = Something to Share: Spots of Light
|vo_07_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share - Spots of Light.ogg
|vo_07_04_tx         = あんた、小っちゃい頃に木漏れ日って踏んだことある？晴れた日に、木々の隙間から漏れてくる光で、踏んだら消えると思うたらいつも足の甲に乗っかってくんねん。せやから、なんべんもなんべんも踏むんやけど、成功した試しがあらへん…あんまりにも悔しうて、道端の岩に座って溜め息ついたことあんねん、「はぁ、この世には踏めないもんもあるんやなぁー」って。
|vo_07_04_rm         = Anta, chicchai koro ni komorebi tte funda koto aru? Hareta hi ni, kigi no sukima kara moretekuru hikari de, fundara kieru to omoutara itsumo ashi no kou ni nokkattekun nen. Seyakara, nanben mo nanben mo fumu n'ya kedo, seikou shita tameshi ga arahen... Anmari ni mo kuyashiute, michibata no iwa ni suwatte tameiki tsuita koto annen, "Haa, kono yo ni fumenai mon mo aru n'ya naaa" tte.
|vo_07_04_tl         = When you were little, did you ever step on a spot of light? On sunny days, the light passes through the gaps in the trees, and I thought it would disappear if I stepped on it, but it always jumped onto my foot instead. So I tried stepping on it time after time, but I never succeeded... I was so upset, I sat on a rock beside the road and sighed, thinking "Ah, so there are things in this world that can't be stepped on..."

|vo_07_05_title      = 興味のあること…
|vo_07_05_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_05_tx         = ある夏祭りで、金魚すくいをしとる子供を横から見とったらふと思いついたんや、水に浮かぶ花火を作れへんかなーって。ほんで誕生したのが「金魚花火」や！水面を泳いだり、七色に光ったり、泡をぶくぶく吐いたりする、不思議やろ！うちもほんまに成功すると思ってへんかったから、世の中ってやっぱ不思議やなぁ～。
|vo_07_05_rm         = Aru natsumatsuri de, kingyo-sukui wo shitoru kodomo wo yoko kara mitottara futo omoitsuita n'ya, mizu ni ukabu hanabi wo tsukurehen ka naa tte. Honde tanjoushita no ga "Kingyo Hanabi" ya! Minamo wo oyoidari, nanairo ni hikattari, awa wo bukubuku haitari suru, fushigi yaro! Uchi mo honma ni seikou suru to omottehenkatta kara, yo no naka tte yappa fushigi ya naa~.
|vo_07_05_tl         = One summer festival, I had a sudden thought while watching some children catching goldfish, and I wondered if I could make fireworks that float on the water. And so the "Goldfish Fireworks" were born! They can swim on the surface of the water, emit light in rainbow colors, and spit bubbles &mdash; isn't that amazing! Even I didn't think it would actually work, but the world is full of wonders after all.

|vo_08_01_title      = 北斗について…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Beidou]]
|vo_08_01_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Beidou.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 稲妻が鎖国してからは、北斗姉ちゃんにずっと花火の運搬を頼んできたんや。で、そのお礼に船の形をしたおっきい花火を用意してビックリさせたろ思うて。「南十字武装船隊」が港を離れる時に、船員たちの目の前でその花火を打ち上げたんや。ほならみんな、船隊の船が飛んでったってびっくりしとったよ、あははっ！せやけど、北斗姉ちゃんはめっちゃ喜んどったで、贈りもんはこうでなくちゃって言うとった、へへへ。
|vo_08_01_rm         = Inazuma ga sakoku shite kara wa, Hokuto-nee-chan ni zutto hanabi no unpan wo tanonde kita n'ya. De, sono orei ni fune no katachi wo shita okkii hanabi wo youi shite bikkuri sasetaro omoute. "Minami Juuji Busou Sentai" ga minato ni hanareru toki ni, sen'in-tachi no me no mae de sono hanabi wo uchiageta n'ya. Honara minna, sentai no fune ga tondetta tte bikkuri shita yo, ahaha'! Seyakedo, Hokuto-nee-chan wa meccha yorokondotta de, okurimon wa kou de nakucha tte yuutotta, hehehe.
|vo_08_01_tl         = Ever since Inazuma was locked down, I've been counting on Big Sis Beidou to deliver my fireworks. So, as thanks, I thought I'd prepare a huge boat-shaped firework to surprise her. As the Crux Armed Fleet left the harbor, I set off the firework right before the sailors' eyes. Then, they all thought a ship from the fleet had flown off and they got frightened, ahaha! But Big Sis Beidou was really pleased, and she said that was exactly how a gift should be, hehehe.

|vo_08_02_title      = 雷電将軍について…
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About the [[Raiden Shogun]]
|vo_08_02_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Raiden Shogun.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 花火は将軍様が求める「永遠」から、いっちゃんかけ離れとるもんや。将軍様は刹那の光なんか稲妻になんの価値もないと思うとるはず。はぁ、「永遠」を握る者には分からへんのやろな。「刹那を生きる人」やからこそ、その刹那の甘美を胸に刻み込もうとしとることに。
|vo_08_02_rm         = Hanabi wa Shougun-sama ga motomeru "eien" kara, icchan kakehanaretoru mon ya. Shougun-sama wa setsuna no hikari nanka Inazuma ni nan no kachi mo nai to omoutoru hazu. Haa, "eien" wo nigiru mono ni wa wakarahen no yaro na. "Setsuna wo ikiru hito" yakara koso, sono setsuna no kanbi wo mune ni kizamikomou to shitoru koto ni.
|vo_08_02_tl         = Fireworks are the furthest thing from the "eternity" the Shogun pursues. She must think that their transient glow is worth nothing to Inazuma. *sigh* Someone with "eternity" in their grasp probably wouldn't understand. It's precisely because we are "people who live for a fleeting moment" that we need to treasure such moments of beauty.

|vo_08_03_title      = 神里綾華について・丁寧さ
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Kamisato Ayaka]]: Seriousness
|vo_08_03_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kamisato Ayaka - Seriousness.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 仕事の関係で、彼女とはよう協力することがあるんや。他の奉行とちごうて、ちゃんとうちの話を最後まで聞いてくれるし、丁寧に答えてくれる、しかも嫌味も言わへん。「おしとやか」っちゅう言葉は、まさに彼女のためにあるんやろな。
|vo_08_03_rm         = Shigoto no kankei de, kanojo to wa you kyouryoku suru koto ga aru n'ya. Hoka no bugyou to chigoute, chanto uchi no hanashi wo saigo made kiite kureru shi, teinei ni kotaete kureru, shikamo iyami mo iwahen. "Oshitoyaka" cchuu kotoba wa, masa ni kanojo no tame ni aru n'yaro na.
|vo_08_03_tl         = We cooperate a lot due to our work connections. Unlike [people from] the other Commissions, she'll listen to everything I have to say and answer me politely, and won't make any rude remarks. The word "ladylike" might have been made just for her.

|vo_08_04_title      = 神里綾華について・銭湯
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About Kamisato Ayaka: Baths
|vo_08_04_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kamisato Ayaka - Baths.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 昔、夏祭りの件で遅くまで相談したことがあったんやけど、くたくたに疲れてもうたから銭湯に誘ったんや…せやけど彼女、「銭湯」が大勢で入る風呂やと知った瞬間、顔を真っ赤にしてもうて。うーん、ええとこのお嬢さんは銭湯に入れへんってことを知るきっかけになったわ。
|vo_08_04_rm         = Mukashi, natsumatsuri no ken de osoku made soudan shita koto ga atta n'ya kedo, kutakuta ni tsukaretemouta kara sentou ni sasotta n'ya... Seyakedo kanojo, "sentou" ga oozei de hairu furo ya to shitta shunkan, kao wo makka ni shitemoute. Uun, ee toko no ojou-san wa sentou ni hairehen tte koto wo shiru kikkake ni natta wa.
|vo_08_04_tl         = Long ago, we discussed matters of the summer festival until it got late, and we were really tired, so I invited her to the ''{{w|Sentō|sentou}}''. ...But the moment she found out that a "''sentou''" was a public bath that many people used together, her face went completely red. Mmm, that was when I first learned that noble ladies can't use public baths.

|vo_08_05_title      = トーマについて…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Thoma]]
|vo_08_05_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Thoma.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = とにかく口達者なヤツや、あの口から出てくる言葉には必ず何らかの考えが込められとる。一見繋がりのなさそうな言葉でも、最後は上手いこと誘導されてまう。うーん…うちとは正反対の性格やさかい、困った時は彼に助けを求めることにするわ。
|vo_08_05_rm         = Tonikaku kuchitassha na yatsu ya, ano kuchi kara detekuru kotoba ni wa kanarazu nanraka no kangae ga komeraretoru. Ikken tsunagari no nasasou na kotoba demo, saigo wa umai koto yuudou saretemau. Uun... Uchi to wa seihantai no seikaku ya sakai, komatta toki wa kare ni tasuke wo motomeru koto ni suru wa.
|vo_08_05_tl         = For the most part, he's a smooth talker, and every word he says has some kind of reasoning behind it. Some words might seem unrelated at first, but in the end, you'll be led towards something clever. Hmm... His character is exactly the opposite of mine, so when I'm troubled, I ask him for help.

|vo_08_06_title      = 八重神子について…
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Yae Miko]]
|vo_08_06_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yae Miko.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = いつやったか神社の祭りで、宮司様のために手持ち花火を用意してくれって綾華ちゃんに頼まれたことがあったんや…せやけど、宮司様って祭りに出席するさかい、神社の境内に座りっきりやろ？宮司様がどうやって花火で遊ぶのか気になって、祭り中ずっと観察しとったんや。ほなら綾華ちゃんがうちのとこにきて、「宮司様、とても満足されておりました」って言うて…えっ？もう花火で遊んだん？ってなって…もしかして、うちが見とったのは宮司様やあらへんかったのかな？
|vo_08_06_rm         = Itsu yatta ka jinja no matsuri de, Guuji-sama no tame ni temochi-hanabi wo youi shite kure tte Ayaka-chan ni tanomareta koto ga atta n'ya... Seyakedo, Guuji-sama tte matsuri ni shusseki suru sakai, jinja no keidai ni suwarikkiri yaro? Guuji-sama ga dou yatte hanabi de asobu no ka ki ni natte, matsuri-juu zutto kansatsu shitotta n'ya. Honara Ayaka-chan ga uchi no toko ni kite, "Guuji-sama, totemo manzoku sasete orimashita" tte yuute... E'? Mou hanabi de asondan? tte natte... Moshi ka shite, uchi ga mitotta no wa Guuji-sama ya arahenkatta no ka na?
|vo_08_06_tl         = One time there was a ritual at the shrine, and Ayaka<ref group="TN •">Yoimiya refers to Ayaka with the diminutive suffix ''-chan'', and is currently the only character who does so.</ref> asked me to prepare some handheld fireworks for the Lady Guuji... But when the Lady Guuji attends a ritual, isn't she supposed to stay in place sitting in the shrine? I wanted to see how she would enjoy the fireworks, so I watched her throughout the whole ritual. Then Ayaka came over to me and said "The Lady Guuji was most pleased"... Huh? She'd already played with the fireworks? ...Could it be that the person I saw wasn't her?

|vo_08_07_title      = 荒瀧一斗について・勝負
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Arataki Itto]]: Duels
|vo_08_07_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Arataki Itto - Duels.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = ああ、あの人なぁ。ああ見えて、子供にけっこう人気なんや。せやけど負けず嫌いやさかい、子供の遊びに付きおうてる内にいつの間にか勝負しとるんや。ラーメンのスープの一気飲み勝負とか、表情を変えんとどっちが梅干しを食えるかとか、ほんで他の子供たちは横でどっちが勝つか予想したり、応援したりする。やれやれうちも負けてられへんな。
|vo_08_07_rm         = Aa, ano hito naa. Aa miete, kodomo ni kekkou ninki nan ya. Seyakedo makezugirai ya sakai, kodomo no asobi ni tsukiouteru uchi ni itsu no ma ni ka shoubu shitoru n'ya. Raamen no suupu no ikki-nomi shoubu to ka, hyoujou wo kaento docchi ga umeboshi wo kueru ka to ka, honde hoka no kodomo-tachi wa yoko de docchi ga katsu ka yosou shitari, ouen shitari suru. Yare yare uchi mo maketerarehen na.
|vo_08_07_tl         = Oh, that guy. Despite his appearance, he is very popular with the children. But he's very competitive, and when we're playing with the children, he'll turn it into a competition all of a sudden. For example, we might compete to drink a bowl of ramen soup in one go, or try eating dried sour plums without making any faces, and then the other children will guess who wins or cheer us on from the sidelines. Well, I can't let myself lose either!

|vo_08_08_title      = 荒瀧一斗について・荒瀧派
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About Arataki Itto: Arataki's Gang
|vo_08_08_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Arataki Itto - Arataki's Gang.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 「荒瀧派」？えぇぇっ！？ただの無職やあらへんの？
|vo_08_08_rm         = "Arataki-ha"? Eee'!? Tada no mushoku ya arahen no?
|vo_08_08_tl         = The "Arataki Gang"? Huh!? He's not just some jobless guy?

|vo_08_09_title      = 楓原万葉について…
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Kaedehara Kazuha]]
|vo_08_09_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kaedehara Kazuha.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = うちって考えなしやさかい、思うたことをすぐ口に出してしまうんや。逆に思慮深い人は自分の事を語らずに、昔の詩とか、道沿いの景色のことしか言わへん。花鳥風月は語れても、目の前の現実については口をつぐむ。あいつもきっと過去に何かあったんやろなぁ、うんうん、よう分かるでぇ。
|vo_08_09_rm         = Uchi tte kangaenashi ya sakai, omouta koto wo sugu kuchi ni dashite shimau n'ya. Gyaku ni shiryo-bukai hito wa jibun no koto wo katarazu ni, mukashi no shi to ka, michizoi no keshiki no koto shika iwahen. Kachoufuugetsu wa katarete mo, me no mae no genjitsu ni tsuite wa kuchi wo tsugumu. Aitsu mo kitto kako ni nanika atta n'yaro naa, un un, you wakaru dee.
|vo_08_09_tl         = I don't think very hard about my actions, so I end up saying whatever comes to mind. On the other hand, deep thinkers never talk about themselves, only about old poetry or the scenery along the road. They may speak of all the beauties of nature,<ref group="TN •">The phrase used is {{ja|花鳥風月|kachoufuugetsu||flower, bird, wind, moon,}} referring to the traditional themes of natural beauty in Japanese aesthetics.</ref> but won't talk about the reality in front of them. I'm sure something must have happened to him in the past. Hmm, I really understand.

|vo_08_10_title      = 九条裟羅について…
|vo_08_10_subtitle   = About [[Kujou Sara]]
|vo_08_10_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kujou Sara.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = 治安と消防関連で天領奉行にはよう通うんやけど、あっこの人達の中でも九条裟羅はいっちゃん筋が通っとるっちゅうか、少なくとも何も分からへん状況からうちのことを頭ごなしに否定せえへん。うちが正しかったら、彼女も素直にうちを認めてくれる。ほんでうちが間違っとったら…はは、トーマに頼んで詫びを入れるしかあらへん！
|vo_08_10_rm         = Chian to shoubou kanren de Tenryou-bugyou ni wa you kayou n'ya kedo, akko no hitotachi no naka demo Kujou Sara wa icchan suji ga toottoru cchuu ka, sukunaku to mo nani mo wakarahen joukyou kara uchi no koto wo atamagonashi ni hitei seehen. Uchi ga tadashikattara, kanojo mo sunao ni uchi wo mitomete kureru. Honde uchi ga machigattottara... Haha, Tooma ni tanonde wabi wo ireru shika arahen!
|vo_08_10_tl         = Due to matters related to public safety and fire prevention, I often have to visit the Tenryou Commission. But I'd say Kujou Sara is the most reasonable of the people there; at least she won't cut me off and say no without understanding the situation. If I'm right, she'll acknowledge me upfront. And if I'm wrong... Haha, I'll just have to get Thoma to help me apologize!

|vo_08_11_title      = 早柚について…
|vo_08_11_subtitle   = About [[Sayu]]
|vo_08_11_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Sayu.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx         = あの子におうたら、うちに教えてくれへん？祭りに連れていきたいんや、それにお友達もぎょうさん紹介したろ思うて。いっつも気怠そうにしとるさかい、一緒に遊ぶ友達がおったら元気になるんちゃうかな？
|vo_08_11_rm         = Ano ko ni outara, uchi ni oshiete kurehen? Matsuri ni tsurete ikitai n'ya, sore ni o-tomodachi mo gyousan shoukai shitaro omoute. Ittsumo kedarusou ni shitoru sakai, issho ni asobu tomodachi ga ottara genki ni naru n chau ka na?
|vo_08_11_tl         = If you meet that kid, could you let me know? I want to take her to a festival, and I think I can introduce her to lots of friends. She always looks so listless, so wouldn't she cheer up if she had some friends to play with?

|vo_08_12_title      = クレーについて…
|vo_08_12_subtitle   = About [[Klee]]
|vo_08_12_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_12_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Klee.ogg
|vo_08_12_tx         = モンドに爆弾作りの得意な子がおるんやて！？爆弾も花火も似たようなもんやし、花火作りも天才かもしれへんな。一度会うてみたいもんやわ。あっ、せやけど…子供に爆弾は危険やあらへん？モンドの人はなんも言わへんの？
|vo_08_12_rm         = Mondo ni bakudan-dzukuri no tokui na ko ga oru n'ya te!? Bakudan mo hanabi mo nita you na mon yashi, hanabi-dzukuri mo tensai ka mo shirehen na. Ichido aute mitai mon ya wa. A', seyakedo... kodomo ni bakudan wa kiken ya arahen? Mondo no hito wa nan mo iwahen no?
|vo_08_12_tl         = You say there's a kid in Mondstadt who's good at making bombs!? Bombs and fireworks are similar, so she might be a genius at making fireworks too. I'd like a chance to meet her. Ah, but...aren't bombs dangerous for kids? Don't the people of Mondstadt say anything about that?

|vo_09_01_title      = 宵宮を知る・1
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = うちの物語が聞きたいって？ええよ、こっち座りぃ、自慢の「長野原」家の話をしたるで！めったに聞かれへん真面目な話やからなぁ。
|vo_09_01_rm         = Uchi no monogatari ga kikitai tte? Ee yo, kocchi suwarii, jiman no "Naganohara"-ke no hanashi wo shitaru de! Metta ni kikarehen majime na hanashi yakara naa.
|vo_09_01_tl         = You want to hear a story of mine? All right, sit here, and I'll tell you one I'm proud of: the story of the Naganohara family! You'll rarely hear me talk about something this serious, you know.

|vo_09_02_title      = 宵宮を知る・2
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship    = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = うちの家では代々、花火を注文したお客さん一人一人に短冊を渡しとるんや。短冊には長野原家の者しか読まれへん花火の作り方が載っとって、十年経っても百年経っても、お客さんが短冊を持ってくれば、当時とおんなじ花火を作れるようになっとる。
|vo_09_02_rm         = Uchi no ie de wa daidai, hanabi wo chuumon shita okyakusan hitori-hitori ni tanzaku wo watashitoru n'ya. Tanzaku ni wa Naganohara-ke no mono shika yomarehen hanabi no tsukurikata ga nottotte, juunen tatte mo hyakunen tatte mo, okyakusan ga motte kureba, touji to onnaji hanabi wo tsukureru you ni nattoru.
|vo_09_02_tl         = For generations, our family has been giving each client who orders fireworks a paper slip. It contains a firework formula that only those of the Naganohara family can read, and no matter whether ten years or a hundred years pass, if a client brings us that paper slip, we can make the very same firework from that time.

|vo_09_03_title      = 宵宮を知る・3
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship    = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 最高の花火に最高の瞬間、移ろいやすい一瞬の気持ちが花火へと収まり、違うた形で受け継がれてく。短冊は、過去を振り返りたい人の門を開けるための鍵。せやから「長野原」の花火職人の仕事は、みんなの門を開く手助けをすることなんや。
|vo_09_03_rm         = Saikou no hanabi ni saikou no shunkan, utsuroiyasui isshun no kimochi ga hanabi he to osamari, chigouta katachi de uketsugareteku. Tanzaku wa, kako wo furikaeritai hito no mon wo akeru tame no kagi. Seyakara "Naganohara" no hanabi shokunin no shigoto wa, minna no mon wo hiraku tedasuke wo suru koto nan ya.
|vo_09_03_tl         = The greatest fireworks come with the greatest moments; fleeting emotions that can easily slip away are captured within the fireworks and passed down in a different form. The paper slips are a key to a gate for people who want to look back upon the past. That means the job of Naganohara's firework makers is to help everyone with opening that gate.

|vo_09_04_title      = 宵宮を知る・4
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship    = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 夏祭りでは時折り感動的な物語が生まれるんや。花火の下で知りおうた人たちが成長して、ほんで年を取って老いていく。彼らがかつての花火を打ち上げた時、空を照らすんは在りし日の姿…花火は永遠にはなれへんけど、花火に秘められた素晴らしい想いは稲妻と共に永遠を歩むべきなんや。
|vo_09_04_rm         = Natsumatsuri de wa tokiori kandouteki na monogatari ga umareru n'ya. Hanabi no shita de shiriouta hitotachi ga seichou shite, honde toshi wo totte oiteiku. Karera ga katsute no hanabi wo uchiageta toki, sora wo terasu n wa arishihi no sugata... Hanabi wa eien ni wa narehen kedo, hanabi ni himerareta subarashii omoi wa Inazuma to tomo ni eien wo ayumu beki nan ya.
|vo_09_04_tl         = From time to time, the summer festival gives rise to moving tales. Those who met under the fireworks grow up, and then grow old. When they set off the same fireworks as they did before, the skies reflect that same image from the old days... Fireworks are not eternal, but the wonderful emotions hidden within them should walk alongside Inazuma into eternity.

|vo_09_05_title      = 宵宮を知る・5
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship    = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 最後の物語は…いや、やめとくわ、今はあんたと静かに花火を見てたい。今宵の絶景と、あんたが話してくれた言葉を全部書き留めたい。ああ、誤解せえへんで、もう終いっちゅう意味やあらへん。…うちとあんたの「物語」を、ここから書き始めるっちゅう意味や。
|vo_09_05_rm         = Saigo no monogatari wa... Iya, yametoku wa, ima wa anta to shizuka ni hanabi wo mitetai. Koyoi no zekkei to, anta ga hanashite kureta kotoba wo zenbu kakitometai. Aa, gokai seehen de, mou shimai cchuu imi ya arahen. ...Uchi to anta no "monogatari" wo, koko kara kakihajimeru cchuu imi ya.
|vo_09_05_tl         = As for the final story... No, I'll stop now, I want to watch the fireworks quietly with you. I want to record all of tonight's beautiful scenery and the words you shared with me. Ah, don't get the wrong idea, I don't mean to say it's all over. ...I mean that our "story" begins here.

|vo_10_01_title      = 宵宮の趣味・遊ぶ
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies: Playing
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies - Playing.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 花火や！なんや、あかんの？せやなぁ…難しい質問や、お隣さんとお喋りするのも好きやし、子供たちと夏祭りにいくのも好きやし、泳ぐのも、山で果物を採るのも好きや。ああっ、一つに決められへん…あっ、そや！趣味はみんなと遊ぶことや！
|vo_10_01_rm         = Hanabi ya! Nan ya, akan no? Seyanaa... muzukashii shitsumon ya, o-tonari-san to o-shaberi suru no mo suki yashi, kodomotachi to natsumatsuri ni iku no mo suki yashi, oyogu no mo, yama de kudamono wo toru no mo suki ya. Aa', hitotsu ni kimerarehen... A', soya! Shumi wa minna to asobu koto ya!
|vo_10_01_tl         = Fireworks! What, that's no good? Right... that's a hard question; I like chatting with the neighbors, and I like going to the summer festival with the kids, and swimming, and I like picking fruit in the mountains. Ah, I can't choose just one... Oh, I've got it! My hobby is playing with everyone!

|vo_10_02_title      = 宵宮の趣味・モノマネ
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies: Copycat
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies - Copycat.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = くるんっ！ん？なんや、今パイモンちゃんが消える時のマネをしとるんや！
|vo_10_02_rm         = Kurun'! N? Nan ya, ima Paimon-chan ga kieru toki no mane wo shitoru n'ya!
|vo_10_02_tl         = ''Kurun''! Hmm? What, I'm copying the sound Paimon makes while disappearing!

|vo_10_03_title      = 宵宮の悩み…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = 長いこと読んどった連載小説がとうとう完結したんやけど、ヒロインが記憶喪失になって、挙げるはずやった婚礼もなしになってもうた…悲しい、なんちゅうことや…
|vo_10_03_rm         = Nagai koto yondotta rensai shousetsu ga toutou kanketsu shita n'ya kedo, hiroin ga kioku soushitsu ni natte, ageru hazu yatta konrei mo nashi ni nattemouta... Kanashii, nan chuu koto ya...
|vo_10_03_tl         = The serialized novel I've been reading for a long time finally reached its end, but the heroine lost her memory, and the planned wedding came to nothing... That's so sad, what's up with that...

|vo_10_04_title      = 好きな食べ物…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = うちは主食よりも菓子の方が好きや。祭りの時に屋台を一つずつ回って、お腹いーっぱいになるまで食べるんや。ところで、あんたって菓子を作れたりせえへん？うちが作った団子と交換しいひん？おっきいのを取ってええから。
|vo_10_04_rm         = Uchi wa shushoku yori mo kashi no hou ga suki ya. Matsuri no toki ni yatai wo hitotsuzutsu mawatte, onaka iippai ni naru made taberu n'ya. Tokoro de, anta tte kashi wo tsukuretari seehen? Uchi ga tsukutta dango to koukan shiihin? Okkii no wo totte ee kara.
|vo_10_04_tl         = I prefer snacks to entrees. During festivals, I'll go from stall to stall, eating until I'm full. By the way, can you make snacks? Wanna trade for the dango I made? You can take the big ones.

|vo_11_01_title      = 嫌いな食べ物…
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = 牛乳や。飲んだらお腹が花火大会みたいにドンッドンッ！ってなってまうんや。せやけど、牛乳が入った料理とか菓子はぜんぜん平気でな、何なんやろな…お腹の仙霊さん、好き嫌いが激しいんやろか？
|vo_11_01_rm         = Gyuunyuu ya. Nondara onaka ga hanabi taikai mitai ni donddon'! tte nattemau n'ya. Seyakedo, gyuunyuu ga haitta ryouri to ka kashi wa zenzen heiki de na, nan nan yaro na... Onaka no Senrei-san, suki-kirai ga hageshii n'yaro ka?
|vo_11_01_tl         = It's milk. When I drink it, my stomach ends up going "boom! boom!" like a fireworks display. But dishes and snacks with milk in them are completely fine, so what's up with that... Could it be that the Seelie in my stomach is incredibly picky?

<!-- Receiving a Gift -->
|vo_11_02_title      = 贈り物を受け取る・1
|vo_11_02_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = わぁ、あんた甘味を作るんが上手いんやな！祭りの屋台で出したら、絶対いっちゃん人気でると思うで！
|vo_11_02_rm         = Waa, anta kanmi wo tsukuru n ga umai n'ya na! Matsuri no yatai de dashitara, zettai icchan ninki deru to omou de!
|vo_11_02_tl         = Wow, you're great at making sweets! If you served them at a festival stall, I think it'd definitely be the most popular!

|vo_11_03_title      = 贈り物を受け取る・2
|vo_11_03_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = うまいもん食べたら、元気が出るもんや。そんで元気が出たら、次は物語を語りとうなる。ほな、ええ物語、選んどくな！
|vo_11_03_rm         = Umai mon tabetara, genki ga deru mon ya. Sonde genki ga detara, tsugi wa monogatari wo kataritou naru. Hona, ee monogatari, erandoku shi na!
|vo_11_03_tl         = Eating good food perks you up. And when you feel perked up, you'll want to tell some stories. Well then, I'm gonna pick a great story!

|vo_11_04_title      = 贈り物を受け取る・3
|vo_11_04_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_04_tx         = んん？なんや、お腹でフライムがはしゃいどるみたいやな…さすがに、それはないと思うんやけど…
|vo_11_04_rm         = Nn? Nan ya, onaka de Furaimu ga hashaidoru mitai ya na... Sasuga ni, sore wa nai to omou n'ya kedo...
|vo_11_04_tl         = Hmm? Oh, it feels like there's a {{lex|Specter|ja}} making merry in my stomach... I really don't think that's right, though...

|vo_12_01_title      = 誕生日…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = 誕生日を楽しむんはあんただけやあらへんで、ケーキを贈る人、蠟燭に火つける人、祝ってくれる人、あんたが生まれたことをみんな感謝しとる。せやから、騒がしい方がええ。みんなに祝ってもらうんや！さあ、おめでとうさん！準備はええか？でっかい花火、打ち上げるでぇー！
|vo_12_01_rm         = Tanjoubi wo tanoshimu n wa anta dake ya arahen de, keeki wo okuru hito, rousoku ni hitsukeru hito, iwatte kureru hito, anta ga umareta koto wo minna kansha shitoru. Seyakara, sawagashii hou ga ee. Minna ni iwatte morau n'ya! Saa, omedetousan! Junbi wa ee ka? Dekkai hanabi, uchiageru dee!
|vo_12_01_tl         = Birthdays aren't for you to enjoy alone; those who send you cakes, light candles, and send their well-wishes are all thankful that you were born. That's why they should be lively occasions, so that everyone can celebrate! Well then, happy birthday! Are you ready? I'm gonna set off some big fireworks!

|vo_13_01_title      = 突破した感想・起
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = もっと高く、もっと響きぃ！
|vo_13_01_rm         = Motto takaku, motto hibikii!
|vo_13_01_tl         = The higher [they fly], the louder [they explode]!

|vo_13_02_title      = 突破した感想・承
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = ふっふ～ん！弓矢で花火を打ち上げるのもありやな！
|vo_13_02_rm         = Fuffu~n! Yumiya de hanabi wo uchiageru no mo ari ya na!
|vo_13_02_tl         = Heh-heh! So I can set off fireworks with a bow and arrow, too!

|vo_13_03_title      = 突破した感想・転
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = せっかくあんたから戦い方を学んだし、いっそのこと花火職人だけやなく、日雇い冒険者でもやろかな…「英雄」もええかもしれへんな？
|vo_13_03_rm         = Sekkaku anta kara tatakaikata wo mananda shi, isso no koto hanabi shokunin dake ya naku, hiyatoi boukensha demo yaro ka na... "Eiyuu" mo ee ka mo shirehen na?
|vo_13_03_tl         = With these combat skills I've learned from you, maybe I should be more than a firework maker, and take up some day work as an adventurer... Or maybe even a "hero"?

|vo_13_04_title      = 突破した感想・結
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 「『英雄』&mdash;&mdash;宵宮姉さん参上！悪霊退散！正義必勝！」<br />この台詞を言うたあと、あんたから教わった力を子供たちに紹介するのはどうや？かっこええんとちゃう？あははっ、あんたも遠慮せんと、いじめられたらこの宵宮姉さんに言うんやで！
|vo_13_04_rm         = "'Eiyuu'{{lmdash}} Yoimiya-nee-san sanjou! Akuryou taisan! Seigi hisshou!" Kono serifu wo yuuta ato, anta kara osowatta chikara wo kodomotachi ni shoukai suru no wa dou ya? Kakkoee n to chau? Ahaha', anta mo enryo sen to, ijimeraretara kono Yoimiya-nee-san ni yuu n'ya de!
|vo_13_04_tl         = "The 'Hero' &mdash; Big Sis Yoimiya is here! Evil spirits begone! Justice prevails!" How's this line for introducing the powers you've taught me to the children? Isn't it cool? Ahaha, you can go ahead and let the great Big Sis Yoimiya know if you ever get picked on, too!
}}
